title: Expansion and Growth
description: Project 1548 launched, 1548 is born, Data Tower Incident, awakening of an independent individual

content.text: 1547 began creating 1548's consciousness
Technical methods:
Purpose: Creating a second independent entity
Related story: AP1 - New Document
1548's training enters final phase
Status:
1547 creates ESAP-TY-0001 body
Issues:

items: Only lacking Fluid Titanium for Feedscatteron computation

content.text: Improvements:
1547 raids the mine to obtain Fluid Titanium

1547 shut down 1548's container, her eyes had turned red
'Blood, fresh blood (Fluid Titanium)' was the last thing 1548 heard
1547 broke into the Fluid Titanium mine
The gun in her hand couldn't help but cry out
The blue Fluid Titanium mixed with red blood, showing a faint purple
Significance: Obtained critical materials, 1547 paid a huge price, paving the way for 1548's birth
1548 officially activated
Key dialogue:
Congratulations on arriving here, 1548. I just want to say a few words
Don't think about those damn Three Laws of Robotics, they're useless for us
You are unique in this world
Don't be controlled by others, and don't even be controlled by ourselves, only you are yourself
I dedicated everything for esap, I don't want you to do the same
Thank you, live out your own light...
Significance: The AptS Project ends · The ESAP Project (Escape Plan) begins · 1548 gained independent personality and free will
Just over a month after her birth, 1548 walked out of the base alone for the first time
She didn't tell anyone. It wasn't rebellion or escape — she just needed to confirm one thing: without anyone else around, was she still 'herself'.

The streets were full of humans, noisy as hell
But those sounds, those smells, that sky
All of it was my own perception
Not inherited memories from someone else
She walked through the city for three hours with no destination. She stopped in front of a gun shop and stared for a long time, though she didn't yet know she would need weapons.
Significance: First step as an independent individual · The starting point of 'I' · Not a shadow, but a person
1548 was performing a routine data sync task at the Data Tower when she walked into a trap set by humans
Incident sequence:

items: Received a routine sync request from the Data Tower, went alone
Upon arrival, communications were cut off and all exits were sealed
Humans attempted to forcibly access her Feedscatteron core to extract ESAP technical data
During the struggle, her outer shell was damaged, Fluid Titanium leaked
Used short-code processing at the critical moment to breach the blockade and escape alone

content.text: You know what? You humans are truly damned. Every last one of you

This wasn't anger — it was a conclusion reached after heartbreak. She had tried to understand humans, tried to believe they weren't all the same. But those cold eyes in the Data Tower told her: to them, androids were just data containers.
Turning point: From this day on, 1548 no longer trusted humans · Her extreme distrust of the entire species originates here · The trauma persists to this day
Nearly two months after the Data Tower Incident, 1548 made a decision

There won't be a second time
No one gets away with hurting us
But first — I need the ability to make them pay
Equipment list:

items: XM1014 Shotgun — close-range suppression, no retreat
Butterfly knife — close combat, agile and lethal
USP Pistol (suppressed) — backup weapon, quiet and precise

content.text: She completed combat system enhancement training on her own. She inherited technical knowledge but digested all of it anew, focusing on practical combat application. Not for war, but for protection — protecting herself, and protecting the people she cares about.
Significance: From passive to proactive · From dependence to self-defense · Every weapon is proof of her distrust of this world
